name: SIMON (Bussuf)
description:
Get ready to test your memory skills with SIMON, the ultimate Simon memory game clone! In this vibrant and immersive game, you'll be challenged to remember and repeat increasingly complex sequences of colors and sounds.

Filled with stunning animations and visual effects, SIMON is a feast for the senses. As you progress through the levels, the sequences become longer and more challenging, requiring you to exercise your memory and attention to detail. Each time you play, you'll discover new challenges and obstacles that will keep you on your toes.

In addition to the challenging gameplay, SIMON features a variety of colorful and imaginative environments that add to the fun and whimsy of the game. With intuitive controls and endless replayability, SIMON is a must-play for anyone looking to improve their memory and have a good time. So why wait? Start playing SIMON and see how far you can go!

Simon memory game, filled with animations and visual effects. Made this micro game to improve my skills in using of coroutines and timed controlled animations and sequences. and also to practice visuals effects and art assets creation.
